R3OA01
Metroid Other M

Instant boost (Press B) (view note) [benny3t3]
48000000 80C761DC
4A100000 00000C24
DE000000 80008200
282DBEC2 00000401
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000402
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000404
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000408
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000409
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 0000040A
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000405
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000406
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000601
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000602
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000604
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000608
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000609
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 0000060A
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000605
14000000 00000000
E2000001 00000000
282DBEC2 00000606
14000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Press B while running to activate.
This code will also work while holding or pressing the 2 button
You do not need to hold the B button
need speed booster
does not work in certain post game areas

Hyper Speed Morph Ball [ZiT]
48000000 80C8FF44
DE000000 80008180
4A100000 000000A8
14000000 3F82C000
14000028 3F82C000
E0000000 80008000
Accelerates by doing Jump.
Please change the pointer address from "80C8FF44" to "80C761DC" when the code doesn't work or freezes.

Sams Proliferation ( B and 1 and 2 and - Button ) [ZiT]
282DBEC2 00001700
00CA4F4C 00000001
E0000000 80008000
Please do not push the button many times.
It freezes when becoming Morph Ball.

Zero Suit Samus [ZiT]
282DBEC2 00008400
82200000 80CA4E20
84200000 80003204
22003204 000FFFFF
82200000 80CA4E20
84200000 80003200
82200000 80003210
86000000 00000001
84200000 80003210
E0000000 80008000
282DBEC2 00008800
24003210 00000000
04CA41F8 000FFFFF
04C7D4CC 000FFFFF
00CA4FAD 00000001
00CA4FDB 00000003
04003210 00000000
82200000 80003220
86000000 00000001
84200000 80003220
E0000000 80008000
282DBEC2 00008200
24003220 00000000
82200000 80003200
84200000 80CA41F8
84200000 80C7D4CC
00CA4FAD 00000001
00CA4FDB 00000003
04003220 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Operation Explanation
1. Wait till a Samus can act.
2. Push Home and B Button.
3. Push Home and A Button.
4. Continue is done.
5. Return : Push Home and 1 Button.
6. Continue is done.
There is a possibility of influencing the progress of the game harmfully.
Please acquire the backup of the save data beforehand.

If "6F8D" is changed to "10D8", the following code can be used.
-Character Size
-Skeleton Mode
-Walk Through Walls
-Invincible Mode
-Hyper Speed
-Hyper Rapid Fire

Multi-Jump ( For Zero Suit Samus ) [ZiT]

A1830002 2C0C10D8
40820008 FC21F82A
D0230068 00000000
E0000000 80008000
2A2DBEC2 FEFF0100
046A4554 D0230068
E0000000 80008000

Move Anytime [ZiT]
C2566B90 00000006
819C0000 A18C0002
2C0C6F8D 41820010
2C0C10D8 41820008
4800000C 38000002
901C008C 2C000000
60000000 00000000
When Zero Suit Samus cannot get off the elevator.

2C0C6F8D 41820008

CC000000 00000000

Power Bomb needs to be obtained.

One Shot One kill [ukuneko]
282DC06A 00000020
04649634 60000000
C2694FFC 00000007
83C30068 A3DE0002
2C1E6F8D 41820024
2C1E2931 4182001C
2C1E1AD7 41820014
3FC08069 63DE5044
7FC903A6 4E800420
7C054840 00000000
CC000000 00000000
04694FFC 7C054840
04649634 40820154
E0000000 80008000
*Classic Controller Y ON/OFF
*StatusMater glowing red when this code is enable.
*This code will ignore a LavaDragon(Boss) and IndustrialMachine/Mech(Boss).

Samus Damage modifier [ukuneko]
08AFCD30 xxxxxxxx
20030004 00000000
x 0.1 = 3DCCCCCD EasyPlay
x 0.25 = 3E800000
x 0.5 = 3F000000
3F800000 Def Normal mode
3FB33333 Def Hard mode
x 1.5 = 3FC00000
x 2.0 = 40000000
x 3.0 = 40400000
x 4.0 = 40800000 HardPlay
HP does not decrease = 0000000
Should not be used with invincible mode.

Enemy Damage Modifier [ukuneko]
C2694FF0 00000004
83C30068 A3DE0002
2C1E6F8D 41820008
1C8400xx 7D040050
60000000 00000000
*Samse's Beam Does Damage XX
01 x1
02 x2
04 x4
08 x8
10 x10
16 x16
32 x32
Note:
Lava Dragon(Boss) x4 recommended
Industrial Machine/Mech(Boss) x2 recommended

Open Sesame [Y.S.]
20CCCD88 00000003
04CCCD88 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Use this code when you got stuck in Sector 3;
http://www.joystiq.com/2010/09/18/game-breaking-bug-found-in-metroid-other-m/
-The show must go on-

Open Sesame(Press B+UP / B+DOWN to lock / unlock) [Y.S.]
282DBEC2 00000402
04CCCD88 00000003
282DBEC3 00000401
04CCCD88 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Use Missiles in 3rd person view [Y.S.]
0454E368 38000001
0454D9F4 3B600001
0454D9CC 3B600001
0454D9AC 3B600002
0454D998 3B600003
4E000010 00000000
C2699544 00000003
80630004 48000009
DDDDDDDD 7D8802A6
906C0000 DEADFACE
32000000 00000000
20C78980 00000000
282DBEC2 FBFF0400
0454D9F4 3B600004
0454D9CC 3B600004
0454D9AC 3B600005
0454D998 3B600006
E0000000 80008000
You can shoot missiles while holding B button

Play as Zero Suit Samus [Y.S.]
20CA4FD8 00000006
282DBEC2 00008400
04837EE8 60000000
282DBEC3 00008800
04837EE8 4182000C
E0000000 80008000
Samus: Press HOME+A at continue screen
ZSS: Press HOME+B at continue screen

Stop Reboot Timer [kenobi]
205AF7C4 4182000C
045AF7C4 4800000C
E0000000 80008000
